description:
Yuri is doing great at his job with the Secret Police. His assignment today is to investigate a former newspaper reporter suspected of selling articles slandering Ostania to Westalis. Anya`s favorite cartoon hero Bondman shows off his elegant spy moves!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Entre mission et famille / Bondman le Magnifique / Le cœur d`une enfant / Le réveil
Mission and Family / The Elegant Bondman / The Heart of a Child I / The Heart of a Child II / Waking Up
Ninmu to Kazoku / Karei naru Bondman / Kodomogokoro I / Kodomogokoro II / Mezamashi
任務と家族 / 華麗なるボンドマン / 子ども心I / 子ども心II / 目覚まし
